text: aelamah jhana heqweq besher meqdemh az aneja keh shenasaea hathat data kelah aedaa khanewadh beshera w heqweq akesan w anetqal napedar anan asas azada w edalet w selh ra der jhan teshekeal madhed az aneja keh edem shenasaea w theqar heqweq besher mentha bh aemal wheshaanhaa guredadh aset keh rewh besherat ra besaan wadasheth w zhewr denaaea keh der an aferad besher der baan w eqadh azad w az ters w feqr faregh bashend benewan balateran amal besher aelam shedh aset az aneja keh asasaan heqweq anesana ra baad ba ajeraa qanewn hemaat kered ta besher benewan akheran elaj beqaam ber ded zelm w feshar mejbewr neguredd az aneja keh asasaan lazem aset tewseh rewabet dewsetanh ban mell ra mewred teshewaq qerar dad az aneja keh merdem mell methed aaman khewd ra bheqweq asasa besher w meqam w arezsh ferd anesana w tesawa heqweq merd w zen mejdedaan der menshewr aelam keredhaned w tesmam rasekh gurefthaned keh bh peasherfet ajetmaea kemek kenend w der mhata azadetr wed zendegua bhetra bewjewd awerned az aneja keh dewl edew metehed shedhaned keh ahetram jhana w reaat waqea heqweq besher w azadahaa asasa ra ba hemkeara sazeman mell methed taman kenend az aneja keh hesn tefahem meshetrekea nesbet baan heqweq w azadaha beraa ajeraa keamel aan tehed kemal ahemat ra dared mejm emewma aan aelamah jhana heqweq besher ra areman meshetrekea beraa temam merdem w kelah mell aelam makened ta jema aferad w hemh arekean ajetma aan aelamah ra daema der med nezr dasheth bashend w mejahedt kenend keh bewsalh telam w terbat ahetram aan heqweq w azadaha tewseh aabed w ba tedabar tedraja mela w banalemlela shenasaea w ajeraa waqea w haata anha cheh der maan khewd mell edew w cheh der ban merdem keshewrhaea keh der qelmerw anha mabashend taman guredd madh awel temam aferad besher azad bednaa maaaned w az lhaz hathat w heqweq ba hem beraberned hemh daraa eqel w wejdan mabashend w baad nesbet bakedagur ba rewh beradera reftar kenend madh dewm her kes matewaned bedwen hacheguwenh temaaz mekheswesa az hath nejead rengu jens zeban medheb eqadh saasa aa her eqadh dagur w hemchenan melat wed ajetmaea therwet weladet aa her mewqeat dagur az temam heqweq w kelah azadahaeakeh der aelamah deker hader shedh aset bherhmend guredd belawh hach tebeada bemel nekhewahed amed keh mebtena ber wed saasa adara w qedaea aa banalemlela keshewr aa serzemana bashed keh shekhes ban teleq dared khewah aan keshewr mesteql thet qawemat aa ghar khewdemkhetar bewdh aa hakemat an beshekela mhedwed shedh bashed madh sewm her kes heq zendegua azada w amenat shekhesa dared madh cheharem aheda ra nematewan der berdegua neguahedashet w dad w setd berdeguan bher shekela keh bashed memnew aset madh penejm aheda ra nematewan thet shekenejh aa mejazat aa reftara qerar dad keh zalemanh w aa ber khelaf anesanat w shewen beshera aa mewhen bashed madh sheshem her kes heq dared keh shekhesat heqweqa aw der hemhja benewan ak anesan der meqabel qanewn shenakheth shewd madh heftem hemh der beraber qanewn mesawa hestend w heq darend bedwen tebead w baleswah az hemaat qanewn berkhewredar shewned hemh heq darend der meqabel her tebeada keh naqed aelamah hader bashed w ber elah her therakea keh beraa chenan tebeada bemel aad betwer tesawa az hemaat qanewn bherhmend shewned madh heshetm der beraber aemala keh heqweq asasa ferd ra mewred tejawez qerar bedhed w an heqweq bewsalh qanewn asasa aa qanewn dagura beraa aw shenakhethshedh bashed her kes heq rejw mewther bemhakem mela salhh dared madh nhem aheda nematewaned khewdesranh tewqaf hebs aa tebead beshewd madh dhem her kes ba mesawat keamel heq dared keh dewaash bewsalh dadeguah mesteql w baterfa mensefanh w elenaan resadegua beshewd w chenan dadeguaha derbarh heqweq w alezamat aw aa her atham jezaea keh baw tewjh peada keredh bashed atekhad tesmam benmaad madh aazedhem her kes keh bh bezhkeara methem shedh bashed bagunah mhesweb khewahed shed ta weqtakeh der jeraan ak dewaa emewma keh der an kelah tedmanhaa lazem beraa defa aw taman shedh bashed teqsar aw qanewnaan mherz guredd hachekes beraa anejam aa edem anejam emela keh der mewq aretkeab an emel bemwejb heqweq mela aa banalemlela jerm shenakheth nemashedh aset mhekewem nekhewahed shed bheman teraq hach mejazata shedadetr az anecheh keh der mewq aretkeab jerm bedan teleq magureft derbarh aheda aemal nekhewahed shed madh dewazedhem aheda der zendegua kheswesa amewr khanewadegua aqametguah aa mekeatebat khewd nebaad mewred medakhelhhaa khewdesranh waq shewd w sherafet w asem w resmesh nebaad mewred hemlh qerar guared her kes heq dared keh der meqabel aaneguwenh medakhelat w hemlat mewred hemaat qanewn qerar guared madh sazedhem her kes heq dared keh der dakhel her keshewra azadanh ebewr w merwer kened w mhel aqamet khewd ra anetkhab nemaad her kes heq dared her keshewra w az jemlh keshewr khewd ra terk kened aa bh keshewr khewd baz guredd madh cheharedhem her kes heq dared der beraber teqab shekenejh w azar penaheguaha jestejw kened w der keshewrhaa dagur penah akhetaar kened der mewreda keh teqab waqeaan mebtena bejrem emewma w gharesaasa aa reftarhaea mekhalef ba asewl w meqased mell methed bashed nematewan az aan heq asetfadh nemwed madh peanezdhem her kes heq dared keh daraa tabeat bashed aheda ra nematewan khewdesranh az tabeat khewd aa az heq teghaar tabeat mherwem kered madh shanezdhem her zen w merd balegha heq darend bedwen hacheguwenh mhedwedat az nezr nejead melat tabeat aa medheb ba hemdagur zenashewea kenend w teshekeal khanewadh dhend der temam medt zenashewea w henguam anhelal an zen w shewher der kelah amewr merbewt bazedwaj daraa heqweq mesawa mabashend azedwaj baad ba redaat keamel w azadanh zen w merd waq shewd khanewadh reken tebaea w asasa ajetma aset w heq dared az hemaat jameh w dewlet bherhmend shewd madh hefdhem her shekhes menferda aa betwer ajetmaea heq malekeat dared aheda ra nematewan khewdesranh az heq malekeat mherwem nemwed madh hajedhem her kes heq dared keh az azada feker wejdan w medheb bherhmend shewd aan heq metdemn azada teghaar medheb aa eqadh w hemchenan metdemn azada azhar eqadh w aaman mabashed w naz shamel telamat medheba w ajeraa merasem dana aset her kes matewaned az aan heqweq menferdaan aa mejtemeaan betwer kheswesa aa betwer emewma berkhewredar bashed madh newzedhem her kes heq azada eqadh w baan dared w heq mezbewr shamel anest keh az dashetn eqaad khewd bam w adetraba nedasheth bashed w der keseb atelaeat w afekear w der akhed w anetshar an betmam wesael memken w bedwen melahezat merza azad bashed madh basetm her kes heq dared azadanh mejam w jemeathaa mesalemtamaz teshekeal dhed hachekes ra nematewan mejbewr besherket der ajetmaea kered madh baset w akem her kes heq dared der adarh amewr emewma keshewr khewd khewah mesteqama w khewah ba wesatet nemaanedguana keh azadanh anetkhab shedh bashend sherket jewad her kes heq dared ba tesawa sheraat bemshaghel emewma keshewr khewd nael aad asas w mensha qedret hekewemt aradh merdem aset aan aradh baad bewsalh anetkhabata aberaz guredd keh az rewa sedaqet w betwer adewara sewret pedared anetkhabat baad emewma w ba reaat mesawat bashed w ba raa mekhefa aa teraqhaa nezar an anejam guared keh azada raa ra taman nemaad madh baset w dewm her kes benewan edew ajetma heq amenat ajetmaea dared w mejaz aset bewsalh mesaea mela w hemkeara banalemlela heqweq aqetsada w ajetmaea w ferhengua khewd ra keh lazemh meqam w nemwed azadanh shekhesat aw aset ba reaat teshekealat w menab her keshewr bedset awerd madh baset w sewm her kes heq dared kear kened kear khewd ra azadanh anetkhab nemaad sheraat mensefanh w redaat bekhesha beraa kear khewasetar bashed w der meqabel bakeara mewred hemaat qerar guared hemh heq darend keh bedwen hach tebeada der meqabel kear mesawa ajert mesawa deraafet darend her kes keh kear makened bemzed mensefanh w redaat bekhesha daheq mashewd keh zendegua aw w khanewadhash ra mewafeq shewen anesana taman kened w anera der sewret lezwem ba her new wesael dagur hemaat ajetmaea tekemal nemaad her kes heq dared keh beraa defa az menaf khewd ba daguran athadah teshekeal dhed w der athadahha naz sherket kened madh baset w cheharem her kes heq asetrahet w feraghet w tefrah dared w bekheswes bemhedwedat meqewl saeat kear w merkhesahaa adewara ba akhed heqweq daheq mabashed madh baset w penejm her kes heq dared keh seth zendeguana w selameta w refah khewd w khanewadhash ra az hath khewrak w mesken w meraqebthaa teba w khedmat lazem ajetmaea taman kened w hemchenan heq dared keh der mewaq bakeara bamara neqs aeda bawegua peara aa der temam mewared dagura keh belel kharej az aredh anesan wesael amerar meash az dest refth bashed az sheraat aberwemnedanh zendegua berkhewredar shewd maderan w kewedkean heq darend keh az kemek w meraqebt mekheswesa bherhmend shewned kewedkean cheh ber ather azedwaj w cheh bedwen azedwaj bednaa amedh bashend heq darend keh hemh az akenew hemaat ajetmaea berkhewredar shewned madh baset w sheshem her kes heq dared keh az amewzesh w perewresh bherhmend shewd amewzesh w perewresh laaqel ta hedweda keh merbewt betelamat abetdaea w asasa aset baad mejana bashed amewzesh abetdaea ajebara aset amewzesh herfhaa baad ba sheraat tesawa keamel berwa hemh baz bashed ta hemh bena basetedad khewd betwanend az an bherhmend guredned amewzesh w perewresh baad tewra hedaat shewd keh shekhesat anesana her kes ra bhed akemel reshed an bersaned w ahetram heqweq w azadahaa besher ra teqwat kened amewzesh w perewresh baad hesn tefahem gudeshet w ahetram eqaad mekhalef w dewseta ban temam mell w jemeathaa nejeada aa medheba w hemchenan tewseh fealathaa mell methed ra der rah hefz selh teshal nemaad peder w mader der anetkhab new amewzesh w perewresh ferzendan khewd nesbet bedaguran awelwat darend madh baset w heftem her kes heq dared azadanh der zendegua ferhengua ajetmaea sherket kened az fenwen w henrha metmet guredd w der peasherfet elema w fewaed an sham bashed her kes heq dared az hemaat menaf menewa w mada athar elema ferhengua aa henra khewd berkhewredar shewd madh baset w heshetm her kes heq dared berqerara nezma ra bekhewahed keh az lhaz ajetmaea w banalemlela heqweq w azadahaea ra keh der aan aelamah deker guredadh aset taman kened w anha ra bemwerd emel begudared madh baset w nhem her kes der meqabel an jamehaa wezafh dared keh reshed azad w keamel shekhesat aw ra maser sazed her kes der ajeraa heqweq w asetfadh az azadahaa khewd feqt tab mhedwedathaeaset keh bewsalh qanewn menhesraan bemnezwer taman shenasaea w meraeat heqweq w azadahaa daguran w beraa reaat meqtedaat shah akhelaqa w nezm emewma w refah hemguana der sheraat ak jameh demwekeratak wed guredadh aset aan heqweq w azadaha der hach mewreda nematewaned ber khelaf meqased w asewl mell methed ajera guredd madh saam hacheak az meqrerat aelamah hader nebaad tewra tefsar shewd keh metdemn heqa beraa dewleta aa jemeata aa ferda bashed keh bemwejb an betwanend her ak az heqweq w azadahaa menderj der aan aelamah ra az ban bebrend w aa der an rah fealata benmaad
